about_the_game:
Welcome Captain, we have an emergency...

In a distant future embark on a dangerous journey onboard the titanic vessel, the Legatus Astartes, as its captain.

Hundreds of light years away from Earth, orbiting an alien planet, you are revived by the ship's AI when the situation become critical. A series of mysterious incidents threaten not only the success of your mission, but also the life of thousands of human colonists in hypersleep.

Taking inspiration from legendary games of the early '80s, as well as some iconic sci-fi movies of the same period, Drones: Defenders Astartes will put you at the helm of formidable space drones capable of immense firepower to reimagine the shoot'em up formula.

With tens of systems to manage in real time, from shields to scanners, decoys and IR lights, Drones immerse players in engaging gameplay rooted in the '80s technology.

Manage weapons systems and sensors while developing offensive and defensive tactics; it will feel not only very real but also interactive.

Without compromising on the easy gameplay of the golden era of shoot'em up, piloting your fleet of drones will feel strangely familiar but also rewarding.

As if it was not enough piloting the drones in the unknown, you will have to endure the Legatus Astartes strong willed AI, Mater Astri, that will not miss a chance to highlight how humans beings are so... fallible.

good Luck, Captain!

In Drones you will find:

  • The old Shoot'em Up formula embedded into an innovative gameplay loop.

  • Dozens of systems to manage, tweak and monitor for a deeper, more satisfying gameplay.

  • Intelligent enemies that will react to player actions, following same physics and logic. No cheating!

  • Ability to upgrades all the major systems of your drone, to face more deadly threats.

  • Fully voiced mothership's AI, Mater Astri ... that is actually voiced by an AI!

  • A compelling plot told trough a series of mission briefings and in-game events, all fully voiced by Mater Astri.

Voiceover in English only. For now.

short_description: A 2D, top-down shoot'em up with simulation elements, deeply reminiscent of those vector games from the 80s. Blast your way trough space, enemies and mystery. Upgrade your drones. Endure your mothership's AI cynical attitude and survive the most realistic shoot'em up ever!
